msbt.message: It's important to have a good New Year's Day, my dear. It sets the tone for the entire year! So, I hope you're having a fabulous day. And if not, well, you have 364 more days to turn your year around!
I've put away my planner from last year and I'm going to use my brand- new planner from today on! I plan to pack it with all kinds of thrilling engagements! I do hope you can help me, !
On a celebratory day like today, it's quite alright to cut loose a bit, no?If there was ever a day to indulge in a bit too much , today is that day, !

One way or another, time marches forward and a new year arrives. There is no pause button, my dear. That being the case, I plan to fill this next year with as much laughter and smiles as it will hold. And seeing you here has given me the just the joyful jump-start I needed!

I can't believe it's that time of year already! Once again, I must set my New Year's resolution. Shall I take up ? Perhaps I should take lessons? So many possibilities! How about you, darling? Have you considered competitive dancing? I hear it's all the rage!
